targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  type_inst AS metric,
  last(value,tstamp) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'cpu' AND
  type = 'percent' AND
  type_inst != 'idle'
GROUP BY 1, type_inst,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  type_inst AS metric,
  last(value,tstamp) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'cpu' AND
  type = 'percent' AND
  type_inst != 'idle' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1, type_inst,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  name AS metric,
  last(value,tstamp) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'load' AND
  value = value AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  'TX: ' || plugin_inst  AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN avg(value) >= lag(avg(value)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'TX: ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) THEN avg(value) - lag(avg(value)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'TX: ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) WHEN lag(avg(value)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'TX: ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE avg(value) END)/extract(epoch from min(tstamp) - lag(min(tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'TX: ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval))) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'interface' AND
  type = 'if_octets' AND
  name = '''tx''' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1, plugin_inst, type,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  'RX: ' || plugin_inst  AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN avg(value) >= lag(avg(value)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'RX: ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) THEN avg(value) - lag(avg(value)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'RX: ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) WHEN lag(avg(value)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'RX: ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE avg(value) END)/extract(epoch from min(tstamp) - lag(min(tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'RX: ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval))) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'interface' AND
  type = 'if_octets' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1, plugin_inst, type,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  'read - ' || plugin_inst  AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN last(value,tstamp) >= lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'read - ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) THEN last(value,tstamp) - lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'read - ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) WHEN lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'read - ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE last(value,tstamp) END) / 60 AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'disk' AND
  type = 'disk_octets' AND
  name = '''read''' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1, plugin_inst, type,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  'write - ' || plugin_inst  AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN last(value,tstamp) >= lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'write - ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) THEN last(value,tstamp) - lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'write - ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) WHEN lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY 'write - ' || plugin_inst  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE last(value,tstamp) END) / 60 AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'disk' AND
  type = 'disk_octets' AND
  name = '''write''' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1, plugin_inst, type,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  DISTINCT ON (REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/'))
 REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/') as mountpoint, value
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'df' AND
  type = 'df_complex' AND 
  type_inst = 'used' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
ORDER BY 1,2 DESC

SELECT
  DISTINCT ON (REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/'))
 REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/') as mountpoint, value
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'df' AND
  type = 'percent_bytes' AND 
  type_inst = 'used' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
ORDER BY 1,2 DESC

SELECT
  DISTINCT ON (REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/'))
 REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/') as mountpoint, value
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'df' AND
  type = 'df_complex' AND 
  type_inst = 'free' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
ORDER BY 1,2 DESC

SELECT
  DISTINCT ON (REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/'))
 REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/') as mountpoint, value
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'df' AND
  type = 'percent_bytes' AND 
  type_inst = 'used' AND 
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
ORDER BY 1,2 DESC

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,24h),
  REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/') AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN avg(value) >= lag(avg(value)) OVER (PARTITION BY REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/') ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,24h)) THEN avg(value) - lag(avg(value)) OVER (PARTITION BY REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/') ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,24h)) WHEN lag(avg(value)) OVER (PARTITION BY REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/') ORDER BY $__timeGroup(tstamp,24h)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE avg(value) END) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo() AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'df' AND
  type = 'df_complex' AND
  type_inst = 'used' AND
  value IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1, REPLACE('/' || plugin_inst,'-', '/'),2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  type_inst AS metric,
  last(value,tstamp) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'memory' AND
  type = 'memory' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1, plugin_inst, type,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  tstamp AS "time",
  type_inst AS metric,
  avg(value) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  type = 'pg_numbackends_n' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY type_inst, tstamp,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  tstamp AS "time",
  type_inst AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN last(value,tstamp) >= lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) THEN last(value,tstamp) - lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) WHEN lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE last(value,tstamp) END)/extract(epoch from min(tstamp) - lag(min(tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp)) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  type = 'pg_xact' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY type_inst, tstamp,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  tstamp AS "time",
  plugin_inst AS metric,
  last(value,tstamp) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin = 'df' AND
  type = 'df_complex' AND
  type_inst = value
GROUP BY type_inst, tstamp, identifier,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  type AS metric,
  last(value,tstamp) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  type = 'pg_db_size' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp <  $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(tstamp,$__interval),
  type AS metric,
  last(value,tstamp) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  type = 'pg_db_vac_age' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp <  $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  DISTINCT ON (type_inst)
  type_inst as table, value
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  type = 'table_sizes' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
ORDER BY 1,2 DESC

SELECT
  DISTINCT ON (type_inst)
  type_inst as table, value
FROM collectd
WHERE
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  name = '''indexes_size''' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2 DESC

SELECT
  tstamp AS "time",
  type_inst AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN last(value,tstamp) >= lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) THEN last(value,tstamp) - lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) WHEN lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE last(value,tstamp) END) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  type = 'pg_scan' AND
  type_inst = 'idx_tup_fetch' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp <  $__timeTo()
GROUP BY type_inst, tstamp, type_inst,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  tstamp AS "time",
  type_inst AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN last(value,tstamp) >= lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) THEN last(value,tstamp) - lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) WHEN lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE last(value,tstamp) END) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  type = 'pg_blks' AND
  type_inst = 'idx_read' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY type_inst, tstamp, type_inst,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  tstamp AS "time",
  type_inst AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN last(value,tstamp) >= lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) THEN last(value,tstamp) - lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) WHEN lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE last(value,tstamp) END) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  type = 'pg_n_tup_c' AND
  type_inst = 'ins' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY type_inst, tstamp, type_inst,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  tstamp AS "time",
  type_inst AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN last(value,tstamp) >= lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) THEN last(value,tstamp) - lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) WHEN lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE last(value,tstamp) END) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  type = 'pg_n_tup_c' AND
  type_inst = 'upd' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY type_inst, tstamp, type_inst,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  tstamp AS "time",
  type_inst AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN last(value,tstamp) >= lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) THEN last(value,tstamp) - lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) WHEN lag(last(value,tstamp)) OVER (PARTITION BY type_inst ORDER BY tstamp) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE last(value,tstamp) END) AS "value"
FROM collectd
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(tstamp) AND
  host = '$host' AND
  plugin_inst = '$database' AND
  plugin = 'postgresql' AND
  type = 'pg_n_tup_c' AND
  type_inst = 'del' AND
  tstamp > $__timeFrom() AND
  tstamp < $__timeTo()
GROUP BY type_inst, tstamp, type_inst,2
ORDER BY 1,2

list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ON (host) host as host from identifiers;

list.name: database
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ON (plugin_inst) plugin_inst as plugin_inst from identifiers where plugin = 'postgresql' and host = '$host';

title: PostgreSQL Infrastructure
description: A basic dashboard for monitoring PostgreSQL database clusters using collectd v5+, TimescaleDB/PostgreSQL v10+ and Grafana v6+
